• Traveler's Blessings have a chance to be awarded from most chests in the Traveler's Pale Heart. This includes Cyst chests, Lost Sector chests, Overthrow Level 2 and Level 3 encounter chests, Pathfinder Field Assignment chests, and Triage chests.

• Each daily reset, a Lost Sector, Cyst, or Overthrow grant a guaranteed Traveler's Blessing upon completion. Look on the Traveler's Pale Heart map to find out which activity grants a guaranteed blessing!

• Traveler's Blessings awarded from the above sources will always be chosen from the list of expired Traveler's Blessings.

• Once acquired, Traveler's Blessings can be used for 27 hours before expiring.

After embedding themselves in the environment, the needles will re-weave into a host of Threadlings.

Threadlings you create will return to you and perch if they can't find any nearby targets. Damaging targets with your weapons or melee will send out perched Threadlings to attack.
displayProperties.name: Needlestorm

displayProperties.description:
Hurl an explosive bolt of Void Light at a target, disintegrating those caught within its blast.

Nova Bomb travels slowly and seeks targets. Detonations shatter into smaller seeker projectiles.
displayProperties.name: Nova Bomb: Cataclysm

displayProperties.description:
Unleash your inner fire, making your equipped weapons radiant and enhancing your abilities.

[Melee]  : Release a supercharged melee attack that launches additional projectiles.

[Grenade]  : Create a sentient flame wisp that seeks out targets and detonates in a scorching explosion, then seeks out other nearby targets.

While Song of Flame is active, you and nearby allies regenerate abilities more quickly, are more resistant to incoming damage, and your [Solar] Solar and Kinetic weapons scorch targets.
displayProperties.name: Song of Flame

displayProperties.description:
Summon a [Stasis] Stasis staff. While your Super is active:

[Super Primary]  : Cast out a barrage of [Stasis] Stasis shards that freeze targets.

[Super Secondary]  : Cast out a shockwave that shatters all frozen targets.
displayProperties.name: Winter's Wrath

displayProperties.description:
Chain Arc Lightning from your hands to electrify targets with devastating streams of Arc Light that intensify over time. Casting Stormtrance creates a jolting shockwave underneath you.

[Sprint]  : Teleport forward, consuming a small amount of Super energy.
displayProperties.name: Stormtrance

displayProperties.description:
Weave a vicious rope dart and tear through your targets.

[Light Attack]  : Swing the rope dart in front of you to deal damage. The tip of the dart deals bonus damage, and defeating targets with the tip causes them to explode.

[Heavy Attack]  : Swing the rope dart in a circular motion to deal heavy damage all around you.

[Grenade]  : Use the grapple to move forward quickly.
displayProperties.name: Silkstrike

displayProperties.description:
Summon an electrified dagger and throw it in your aim direction.

When the dagger hits a surface or a target, you blink to its location and perform a powerful whirling strike, damaging any nearby targets. Can be reactivated after the strike to perform additional throws.

If the dagger flies for long enough without impacting anything, it detonates and you blink to the detonation location.
displayProperties.name: Storm's Edge

displayProperties.description:
Tether foes to a Void Anchor, weakening and suppressing them for you and your allies.

The Void Anchors fired from Shadowshot pull targets toward the impact point, which then become traps and wait for prey. Void Anchors have increased range and last longer.
displayProperties.name: Shadowshot: Deadfall

displayProperties.description:

Your Golden Gun deals massively increased precision damage, overpenetrates targets, and creates Orbs of Power on precision hits.

Benefits from being radiant.
displayProperties.name: Golden Gun: Marksman

displayProperties.description:

Squall : Creates a Stasis Storm that slows and damages targets caught inside.

While carrying a Void axe:
[Light Attack]  : Slash forward with your axe, dealing damage and weakening targets.
[Heavy Attack]  : Throw the axe, consuming all remaining ammo.

[Light Attack]  : Attack.

displayProperties.description:
[Super]  : Summon three Void axes and throw them at your foes one after another. On impact, the axes pull in nearby targets and detonate in a weakening explosion. After exploding, the axes can be picked up by you or your allies and used as a weapon for a short time.

While carrying a Void axe:
[Light Attack]  : Slash forward with your axe, dealing damage and weakening targets.
[Heavy Attack]  : Throw the axe, consuming all remaining ammo.
